title: Liana Levi Of Forma Pilates On Maintaining An Active & Healthy Lifestyle, Finding Motivation, & Balance
itunes:title: Liana Levi Of Forma Pilates On Maintaining An Active & Healthy Lifestyle, Finding Motivation, & Balance
description:
#468: On today's episode we are joined by Liana Levi of Forma Pilates. Liana joins the show today to dsicuss how we can maintain and active and healthy lifestyle, stay motivated, and what it takes to have a nice balance in life. 

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE
